docs.lead_paragraph: ''The Grandparent Guide,'' by Dr. Arthur Kornhaber. Contemporary Books, $16.95. Once, grandparents lived over the hill and through the woods, where they baked pies, sat in rocking chairs and talked about the old days.
docs.abstract: Child and family therapist Dr Arthur Kornhaber book Grandparent Guide discusses how today's grandparents influence their grandchildren; lends advice on handling disagreements about parenting, problems with spoiling children and ways to maintain boundaries that are satisfactory to all involved family members; photo (S)
docs.snippet: ''The Grandparent Guide,'' by Dr. Arthur Kornhaber. Contemporary Books, $16.95.      Once, grandparents lived over the hill and through the woods, where they baked pies, sat in rocking chairs and talked about the old days.
